skins.shipDescription: Aircraft carrier C Ark Royal, Hull Number 91!
skins.selfIntroduction: Ark Royal, reporting in! I'm the first aircraft carrier specifically designed and built for the role in the Royal Navy, I'm proud of being a prototype to all other carriers that followed. Little needs to be said about my feats against the Bismarck. Rather I must ask, are there any of those cute little destroyers in our fleet?
skins.acquisition: Ark Royal, reporting in for duty! I am confident in all manners of battle. Why, it was I who managed to destroy Bismarck's rudder!
skins.login: Ready for orders, Commander. I am confident in any kind of battle!
skins.secretaryIdle1: You look like you're busy, Commander. I won't bother you then. Let me know if you need anything.
skins.secretaryIdle2: Commander, umm... can you tell the destroyers to come to my room? I'd like to give them presents.
skins.secretaryIdle3: This is... So cute! *pat pat* Eh? Wh-when did you get here, Commander?!
skins.secretaryTouch: Your warm hands keep me energized to keep fighting, Commander!
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Eh... Commander... please don't... Why are you doing this?!

skins.shipDescription: Nothing says summer like the sun, the beach, and destroyers... Ahem! Th-that's right! Even though we're relaxing, we still have to keep an eye out for enemy destroyers! Commander, I may be in a swimsuit, but I'm ready to sortie at any time!
skins.acquisition: Nothing says summer like the sun, the beach, and destroyers... Ahem! Th-that's right! Even though we're relaxing, we still have to keep an eye out for enemy destroyers! Commander, I may be in a swimsuit, but I'm ready to sortie at any time!
skins.login: Summer, huh... Commander, do you enjoy the summertime? I know I do.
skins.details: It is dangerous to let the destroyers play on the beach alone... I suggest setting aside time every day to allow them to frolic together.
skins.secretaryIdle1: To be honest, Commander, I wanted to provide everyone with some toys to play with while on the beach, but don't know what would be well received. Could I go consult the destroyers to see what they think?
skins.secretaryIdle2: Commander, why have you been staring at me this whole time? Huh, I'm "quite the beauty when I'm not running my mouth"...?!
skins.secretaryIdle3: Some say that my tastes are a bit questionable, but I have complete confidence in my abilities as secretary ship. I'll take care of the work!
skins.secretaryTouch: Destroyers frolicking around in swimsuits? Where?! ...Commander, don't mess with me like that!

skins.JPClientName: バンケットガ`ディアン
skins.shipDescription: One tends to let her guard down at a party like this, but worry not! Put the ball in my hands and let Ark Royal keep you safe!
skins.acquisition: One tends to let her guard down at a party like this, but worry not! Put the ball in my hands and let Ark Royal keep you safe!
skins.login: Commander, status report: all quiet over here.
skins.details: You need to inspect what's on my camera? Well... let's not worry about it until after the party. I promise I'll hand over every last negative!
skins.secretaryIdle1: This camera is strictly for security recording purposes. You never know what might happen. Of course, I could also use it to record some tender moments.
skins.secretaryIdle2: Are you cold, Commander? You can have my jacket.
skins.secretaryIdle3: This party is so noisy, so rowdy. It's my responsibility to take watch over those sweet, innocent, little destroyer girls!
skins.secretaryTouch: Oh, don't worry about me. While everyone else sinks into the enrapturing atmosphere of the evening, someone has to stay sober and alert.
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: You want to dance with me? But, Commander, this... isn't this a little out of the ordinary?

skins.shipDescription: Commander, Happy New Year. Oh no, I'm not going hunting. I'm patrolling the port during the New Year's celebrations. Naturally, I volunteered for the job.
skins.acquisition: Commander, Happy New Year. Oh no, I'm not going hunting. I'm patrolling the port during the New Year's celebrations. Naturally, I volunteered for the job.
skins.login: The more peaceful and inviting the atmosphere, the more one wants to protect it. What do you think, Commander?
skins.details: I can use this gun for ceremonial salutes, as well. I'll put her to good use at the banquet!
skins.secretaryIdle1: Oh those destroyers in their Eastern dresses... Ah, I was just thinking how captivating it all is. These New Year's celebrations really are splendid!
skins.secretaryIdle2: I have already committed everything important about the New Year's programming to memory. If you need anything, Commander, do let me know.
skins.secretaryIdle3: Wherever there is trouble, I shall be there! Such is my solemn oath as guardian of the new year!
skins.secretaryTouch: Commander, would you like to personally carry out the gun salute? Mind the recoil.
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: My neckline is off? Oh, thank you... Oh my, no, it doesn't go like this, does it?!
